pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is a reimplementation of waifu2x converter function, in C++, using OpenCV. This is also a reimplementation of waifu2x python version by Hector Martin. You can use this as command-line tool of image noise reduction or/and scaling.

use.flag: Use nvidia cuda toolkit for speeding up computations. NOTE: works only for subset of nvidia graphic cards so make sure your card is supported before opening a bug about it.
